mapper.select: SELECT c.res_class_name "resClassName", listagg(r.res_class_name, ',') within group(order by r.res_class_name DESC) "resClassName2", r.lv || '' as "level", c.upper_res_class_id "upperResClassId" FROM ( SELECT upper_res_class_id, res_class_name, level as lv FROM RESCLASS START WITH upper_res_class_id IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR res_class_id = upper_res_class_id ) r JOIN RESCLASS c ON r.upper_res_class_id = c.res_class_id GROUP BY r.lv, c.res_class_name, c.upper_res_class_id ORDER BY r.lv , c.res_class_name DESC

SELECT rc.upper_res_class_id "upperResClassId", rc.res_class_name "resClassName" , COUNT(*) AS "mappingNumberOfRes" FROM RESINFO r JOIN RESCLASS rc ON r.res_class_id = rc.res_class_id GROUP BY rc.res_class_name, rc.upper_res_class_id

SELECT urc_name.res_class_name "topUpperResClassName", urc.res_class_name "upperResClassName", rc.res_class_name "resClassName", rc.use_yn "useYn", a.add_item_sn "addItemSn", ad.add_item_name "addItemName", ad.use_yn "addItemUseYn" FROM RESCLASS rc INNER JOIN RESCLASS urc ON urc.res_class_id = rc.upper_res_class_id INNER JOIN RESCLASS urc_name ON urc_name.res_class_id = urc.upper_res_class_id LEFT OUTER JOIN resclassasideinfomapping a ON a.res_class_id = rc.res_class_id LEFT OUTER JOIN additem ad ON ad.add_item_sn = a.add_item_sn WHERE rc.res_class_name = #{resClassName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESCLASS (upper_res_class_id, res_class_id, res_class_name, use_yn, create_date, creater_id, update_date, updater_id) VALUES (#{upperResClassId}, #{resClassId}, #{resClassName}, #{useYn}, SYSDATE, 'wh467925', SYSDATE, 'wh467925')
mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL "level", res_class_id "resClassId", res_class_name "resClassName", upper_res_class_id "upperResClassId" FROM RESCLASS START WITH upper_res_class_id IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR res_class_id = upper_res_class_id ORDER SIBLINGS BY res_class_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESCLASSASIDEINFOMAPPING (res_class_id, add_item_sn, create_date, creater_id) VALUES (#{resClassId},#{addItemSn},SYSDATE,'wh467925')
